name: Sky Club Austria
about: Sky Club Austria, located in Gr√∂bming, is a premier flying school dedicated to providing exceptional flight training and aerial experiences. Our team of highly trained and state-certified flight instructors and tandem pilots ensures a safe and professional environment for all students. We utilize high-quality equipment that is regularly checked and maintained to the highest standards. Offering passenger flights with professional pilots all year round, Sky Club Austria allows anyone to see the world from a bird's eye view. With a focus on safety, quality instruction, and a passion for flight, we make flying accessible and enjoyable for everyone. Whether you're seeking to learn how to fly or simply experience the thrill of flight, Sky Club Austria is your ideal choice.
